org.xlattice.corexml.bind

Class TextBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.corexml.bind.Join
      • org.xlattice.corexml.bind.Binding
        • org.xlattice.corexml.bind.TextBinding

  • public class TextBinding
extends Binding
    Bind a text value in an XML element to the value of the named field in the associated class. The field being bound to must be of type String. If the repeats() modifier is present on this Binding in the Mapping definition, it will be ignored. The maxOccur parameter will always be 1.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon
